Articles.Content:
I may have encountered a bug.

1. Make vessel that has Mk16 parachute as it's root part

2. Focus away from said vessel so that it unloads.

3. Re-focus/re-load into vessel.

4. Undeployed parachute now has same drag as fully deployed one.

Can anybody reproduce this? I'm running a game with a frackton of mods. But I was able to reproduce this using nothing but vanilla parts.
